## ParseOpts interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ParseOpts 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [boolean](./sax.parseopts.boolean.md) | <code>boolean</code> | If <code>true</code>, HTML5 boolean attributes are supported.<!-- -->Default: false |
|  [children](./sax.parseopts.children.md) | <code>boolean</code> | If <code>true</code>, include children tags in  events. For very large documents, this should be disabled to save (or even fit into) memory.<!-- -->Default: true |
|  [entities](./sax.parseopts.entities.md) | <code>boolean</code> | If <code>true</code>, unescape standard XML entities in body text and attrib values.<!-- -->Default: false |
|  [trim](./sax.parseopts.trim.md) | <code>boolean</code> | If <code>true</code>, trims element body, comments and CDATA content. If the remaining string is empty, no event will be generated for this value.<!-- -->Default: false |
